note.p: German-born analytical chemist. Son of the German publisher Friedrich Emil Suchsland. Emigrated to Britain in 1854. In Leeds, Yorkshire, 1861; in Swansea from at least 1871. Granted British nationality, 1874.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/3393/100/39), 1871 (RG10/5456/71/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 March 2016)
Germany, select births and baptisms, 1558–1898 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 March 2016)
UK, naturalisation certificates and declarations, 1870–1912 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 March 2016)
